dataIdInfo.idPurp: The scripts in this toolbox enable you to create a 3D City file geodatabase or ArcSDE enterprise database quickly. You can select any part to create or add to the DB, such as selected relationship classes. Furthermore you can choose the CRS to use for all feature classes. In addition, you can use the Feature ID Generator to populate the FID fields of all features - ensuring that every Featrue in the 3D City database has a unique FID.
